General: - Replaced the recent soul duplication hotfix with new behavior. Pre 10 min, lanes now always split orbs when there are more heroes than the assigned participants for that lane (3+ people in a dual lane, 2+ people in a solo). Previously it only split with 3+ people regardless of the lane, which is what allowed soul abuses when dipping into a solo lane.
- Private lobbies can now assign players to duo and solo lanes

Vindicta: - Fixed some recent bugs with Vindicta {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20} Flight that could cause some large bursts in a direction
- Fixed being able to shoot while using {AbilityIcon|Ability=Ethereal Shift|Size=20} Ethereal Shift and flying with Vindicta

Ethereal Shift: - Fixed being able to shoot while using {AbilityIcon|Ability=Ethereal Shift|Size=20} Ethereal Shift and flying with Vindicta
Fire Rate: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Veil Walker|Size=20} Veil Walker: Fire Rate reduced from 30% to 20%
Veil Walker: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate reduced from 30% to 20%

Flight: - Fixed some recent bugs with Vindicta {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20} Flight that could cause some large bursts in a direction
